splashscreen.text:
# Der Wasserkreislauf 

  Wasser ist für unser Leben unerlässlich. Der Wasserkreislauf verbindet viele Komponenten des Klimasystems der Erde und spielt eine wichtige Rolle beim Transport von Wärme um den Planeten.

slides.altText: Satellites for peat's sake. False colour image including the near-infrared channel hihglights healthy vegetation in red and shows the burn scar in dark brown.
captions: False colour image including the near-infrared channel highlights healthy vegetation in red and shows the burn scar in dark brown.

slides.altText: Satellites for peat's sake. False colour image including the shortwave infrared channels highlights the active fire front in bright red.
captions: False colour image including the shortwave infrared channels highlights the active fire front in bright red.
